title: Steve and Tommy have a little hate.  Cardi B./Nicki Beef???  Sean Hannity is in news.  Dwayne Wade and Kevin Hart smack talk and more.
itunes:title: Steve and Tommy have a little hate.  Cardi B./Nicki Beef???  Sean Hannity is in news.  Dwayne Wade and Kevin Hart smack talk and more.
description:
Steve might be hating on Tommy. Is there really beef between Cardi B. and Nicki? Kendrick Lamar gets a Pulitzer Prize Award. Sean Hannity is linked to Trumps attorney. Dwayne Wade and the Miami Heat are on fire and Kevin Hart is talking trash. Big Dog tells us about our comfort zone in the Closing Remarks and more!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
